body_html: This removes support for some older CUDA archs when building Caffe2. This is needed when building Caffe2 with ATen, as it seems that ATen has a higher minimum version requirement for CUDA.
body_text: This removes support for some older CUDA archs when building Caffe2. This is needed when building Caffe2 with ATen, as it seems that ATen has a higher minimum version requirement for CUDA.
body: This removes support for some older CUDA archs when building Caffe2. This is needed when building Caffe2 with ATen, as it seems that ATen has a higher minimum version requirement for CUDA.
